description.fr:
Lorsqu'un allié de {Companion:204!} termine un déplacement\_:
Pose une case {FloorMechanism:650} autour de lui <sprite name="cell_around">.
description.en:
When one of {Companion:204!}'s allies ends a move:
Places one {FloorMechanism:650} cell around <sprite name="cell_around"> them.
description.es:
Cuando un aliado de {Companion:204!} termina un desplazamiento:
Coloca una casilla {FloorMechanism:650} a su alrededor <sprite name="cell_around">.
description.de:
Wenn ein Verbündeter von {Companion:204!} seinen Zug beendet:
Platziert einmal\_{FloorMechanism:650} auf einem Feld ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
description.pt:
Quando um aliado de {Companion:204!} termina um deslocamento:
Coloca uma célula {FloorMechanism:650} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dele.
